answers.answer: HI there Catz4k: You might want to also want to post this in the diabetes forum.

question: My husband is border-line diabetic (both parents had it) but he is able to control it so far with his diet.  His blood sugar levels fluctuate a lot, e.g.  when he gets up in the morning his sugar level will be around 100-120 but after he exercises on the treadmill for 35 minutes it will go up about 40 points.  We're wondering why this happens.
title: Blood sugar fluctuations
